testcase.name: Search for the particular hotel and book it
testcase.system-out: Given def SearchCall = call read('classpath:data/reusableComponents/Search.feature'){ date_check_in: date_check_in ,date_check_out: date_check_out ,adults_count: adults_count, children_count: children_count ,infants_count:infants_count } . passed * def room_type_code = SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].room_type_code . passed * def rate_plan_code = SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].available_plans[0].rate_plan_code . passed * print room_type_code .................................................... passed * print rate_plan_code .................................................... passed Then match SearchCall.response.success == true ............................ passed Then match SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].room_type_code == "K1DAA" . passed Then match SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].available_plans[0].rate_plan_code == "DAPR" . passed Then assert SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].available_plans[0].total_amount_before_tax < SearchCall.response.availablity_price[0].available_plans[0].total_amount_after_tax . passed Given def BookCall = call read('classpath:data/reusableComponents/Book.feature') . passed Then match BookCall.response.confirmation[0].confirmation_code == '#notnull' . passed Then match BookCall.response.confirmation[0].room_type_code == room_type_code . passed Then match BookCall.response.confirmation[0].adults_count == '#(parseInt(adults_count))' . passed Then match BookCall.response.confirmation[0].children_count == '#(parseInt(children_count))' . passed Then match BookCall.response.confirmation[0].infants_count == '#(parseInt(infants_count))' . passed
